description: Plastic waste includes bottles, bags, containers, and packaging materials.
Paper waste consists of newspapers, magazines, cardboard, and office paper.
Glass waste includes bottles, jars, and broken glass objects.
Metal waste consists of aluminum cans, steel, iron, and other metallic items.
Organic waste includes food scraps, yard waste, and other biodegradable materials.
Electronic waste (e-waste) includes old computers, phones, TVs, and other electronic devices.
Textile waste comprises clothing, fabrics, and other textiles that are no longer usable.
Hazardous waste includes chemicals, batteries, and other materials that pose a risk to health or the environment.
Medical waste consists of used needles, syringes, bandages, and other biomedical materials.
